messages.content: Skimmed_CFG is a powerful anti-burn custom node for latent diffusion models in ComfyUI that allows much higher CFG scales.
What are the different nodes available in Skimmed_CFG?
The nodes in Skimmed_CFG include: Skimmed CFG, Skimmed CFG - replace, Skimmed CFG - linear interpolation, Skimmed CFG - linear interpolation dual scales, and Skimmed CFG - Difference CFG.
What is the special option available only in the first node of Skimmed_CFG?
The special option available only in the first node of Skimmed_CFG is full_skim_negative, which fully skims some part of the conflicting influence.
What are the side-effects of using Skimmed_CFG?
The side-effects of using Skimmed_CFG include better prompt adherence, sharper images, less mess and more randomness due to fewer conflicts between positive and negative predictions.
What is the recommended skimming scale for maximum anti-burn in Skimmed_CFG?
The recommended skimming scale for maximum anti-burn in Skimmed_CFG is 2-3.
What is the recommended skimming scale for colorful or strong style in Skimmed_CFG?
The recommended skimming scale for colorful or strong style in Skimmed_CFG is 5-7.
What is the 'cruise scale' skimming scale in Skimmed_CFG?
The 'cruise scale' skimming scale in Skimmed_CFG is 4.
How can one support the development of Skimmed_CFG and access shared models?
One can support the development of Skimmed_CFG by contributing via Patreon and access shared models through the provided gallery link.
